Sta. SEN.07: Senegal, N side of Cape Verde Peninsula, W of Plage du Virage. Rocky tidal flat with large, rather protected tidal pools with Palythoa-covered boulders and stones, partly sand covered. Shore-collecting. 3.vi.1982, 22.xi.1983.
